ProjectID.title: Project ID
ProjectID.description: Valid Project ID; separate multiple Projects with `\`.

ProjectName.title: Project Name
ProjectName.description: A unique Name for the Project

ProjectDescription.title: Project Description
ProjectDescription.description: Project purpose and/or summary, must provide either project description or supply a Project Attachment

SamplingDesignType.title: Sampling Design Type
SamplingDesignType.description: A code used to identify the type of sampling design employed for this project to ensure that sampling activities can support project objectives.

QAPPApprovedIndicator.title: QAPP Approved Indicator
QAPPApprovedIndicator.description: Indicates whether a Quality Assurance Project Plan (QAPP) has been approved for the submitted project.

QAPPApprovalAgencyName.title: QAPP Approval Agency Name
QAPPApprovalAgencyName.description: An outside approval authority identifier for the QAPP (e.g. EPA or State Organization).

ProjectAttachmentFileName.title: Project Attachment File Name
ProjectAttachmentFileName.description: The text describing the descriptive name used to represent the file, including file extension.  Must provide either project description or supply a Project Attachment

ProjectAttachmentType.title: Project Attachment Type
ProjectAttachmentType.description: File text extension, free text not domain list validation.  Required if Project Attachment File Name is reported.

MonitoringLocationID.title: Monitoring Location ID
MonitoringLocationID.description: Valid Monitoring ID; required for most Activity Type Codes; Must correspond to Monitoring Locations already in WQX/STORET or entered in Monitoring Locations tab

MonitoringLocationDescription.title: Monitoring Location Description
MonitoringLocationDescription.description: Text description of the monitoring location.

TribalLandIndicator.title: Tribal Land Indicator
TribalLandIndicator.description: Indicator denoting whether or not a location is on tribal land

TribalLandName.title: Tribal Land Name
TribalLandName.description: Name of American Indian or Alaskan Native area where the location exists

AlternateMonitoringLocationID.title: Alternate Monitoring Location ID
AlternateMonitoringLocationID.description: Alternate identifier used by other organization

AlternateMonitoringLocationContext.title: Alternate Monitoring Location Context
AlternateMonitoringLocationContext.description: Organization ID for alternate monitoring ID, required if Alternate Monitoring Location ID is reported.

MonitoringLocationSourceMapScale.title: Monitoring Location Source Map Scale
MonitoringLocationSourceMapScale.description: Integer representing distance on ground for one unit of measure on map or photo.  Required when Horizontal Collection Method Name is `Interpolation-Map`

MonitoringLocationHorizontalAccuracyMeas.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy Measure Value
MonitoringLocationHorizontalAccuracyMeas.description: The horizontal measure of the relative accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates

Monitoring LocationHorizontalAccuracyMea.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy Measure Unit Code
Monitoring LocationHorizontalAccuracyMea.description: Unit of measure of the relative accuracy, required if Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy Measure Value is reported.

MonitoringLocationHorizontalCollectionMe.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Collection Method
MonitoringLocationHorizontalCollectionMe.description: Method used to determine Lat/Long coordinates

MonitoringLocationHorizontalCoordinateRe.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Coordinate Reference System

VerticalMeasure.title: Vertical Measure
VerticalMeasure.description: The measure of elevation (i.e., the altitude), above or below a reference datum.

VerticalUnit.title: Vertical Unit
VerticalUnit.description: Unit of measure of the vertical measure, required if Vertical Measure is reported

VerticalCollectionMethod.title: Vertical Collection Method
VerticalCollectionMethod.description: The name that identifies the method used to collect the vertical measure of a reference point.  Required if Vertical Measure is reported.

VerticalCoordinateReferenceSystem.title: Vertical Coordinate Reference System
VerticalCoordinateReferenceSystem.description: The name of the reference datum used to determine the vertical measure (i.e., the altitude).  Required if Vertical Measure is reported.

MonitoringLocationCountryCode.title: Monitoring Location Country Code
MonitoringLocationCountryCode.description: Code for Country,  recommended if state code is used not in (default) US.

MonitoringLocationState.title: Monitoring Location State
MonitoringLocationState.description: Postal abbreviation for Monitoring Locations's primary state, required if county code is reported

MonitoringLocationCounty.title: Monitoring Location County
MonitoringLocationCounty.description: FIPS code for Monitoring Location's primary county

AquiferName.title: Aquifer Name
AquiferName.description: Name of the aquifer in which the well is completed.

WellFormationType.title: Well Formation Type
WellFormationType.description: Name of the primary formation or soils unit, in which the well is completed.

WellHoleDepthMeasureValue.title: Well Hole Depth Measure Value
WellHoleDepthMeasureValue.description: Depth below land surface datum (LSD) to the bottom of the hole on completion of drilling.

WellHoleDepthMeasureUnit.title: Well Hole Depth Measure Unit
WellHoleDepthMeasureUnit.description: Unit of measure of the vertical measure, required if Well Hole Depth Measure Value is reported.

MonitoringLocationAttachmentFileName.title: Monitoring Location Attachment File Name
MonitoringLocationAttachmentFileName.description: The text describing the descriptive name used to represent the file, including file extension.

MonitoringLocationAttachmentType.title: Monitoring Location Attachment Type
MonitoringLocationAttachmentType.description: File text extension, free text not domain list validation.  Required if Monitoring Location Attachment File Name is reported.

ActivityID.title: Activity ID
ActivityID.description: A unique identifier for each Activity (an Activity can be based on a unique lab ID, a suite of on-site field measurements, an individual sample, etc);  Results within one Activity must share the same Activity Type and Activity Medium (example:  a water sample and a sediment sample must be separate Activities; a water sample and a measurement made in the field must be separate Activities; 2 lab results from the same water sample can be the same activity)

ActivityType.title: Activity Type
ActivityType.description: Type of Activity (example: Field Msr/Obs, Sample-Routine, etc.)

ActivityMediaName.title: Activity Media Name
ActivityMediaName.description: Medium in which sample or measurement was taken (example: Water, Sediment, etc.)

ActivityMediaSubdivisionName.title: Activity Media Subdivision Name
ActivityMediaSubdivisionName.description: Name or code indicating the subdivision of media the sample was collected in.

ActivityStartTimeZone.title: Activity Start Time Zone
ActivityStartTimeZone.description: Time Zone for Activity Start Time, required if Activity Start Time entered

ActivityEndTimeZone.title: Activity End Time Zone
ActivityEndTimeZone.description: Time Zone for Activity End Time, required if Activity End Time entered

ActivityRelativeDepthName.title: Activity Relative Depth Name
ActivityRelativeDepthName.description: The name that indicates the approximate location within the water column at which the activity occurred.

ActivityDepthHeightMeasure.title: Activity Depth/Height Measure
ActivityDepthHeightMeasure.description: The distance from the surface to the point in the water column at which the activity is conducted (depth or height measured from a reference point)

ActivityDepthHeightUnit.title: Activity Depth/Height Unit
ActivityDepthHeightUnit.description: Units for Activity Depth Height Measure, required if Activity Depth Height Measure entered

ActivityTopDepthHeightMeasure.title: Activity Top Depth/Height Measure
ActivityTopDepthHeightMeasure.description: The upper vertical extent of an activity (measured from a reference point).

ActivityTopDepthHeightUnit.title: Activity Top Depth/Height Unit
ActivityTopDepthHeightUnit.description: Units for Activity Top Depth Height Measure, required if Activity Top Depth Height Measure entered

ActivityBottomDepthHeightMeasure.title: Activity Bottom Depth/Height Measure
ActivityBottomDepthHeightMeasure.description: The lower vertical extent of an activity (measured from a reference point).  May not be reported if Activity Depth/Height Measure is reported.  Required if Activity Type is Sample-Integrated Vertical Profile.

ActivityBottomDepthHeightUnit.title: Activity Bottom Depth/Height Unit
ActivityBottomDepthHeightUnit.description: Units for Activity Bottom Depth Height Measure, required if Activity Bottom Depth Height Measure entered

ActivityDepthAltitudeReferencePoint.title: Activity Depth Altitude Reference Point
ActivityDepthAltitudeReferencePoint.description: The reference used to indicate the datum or reference used to establish the depth/altitude of an activity.

ActivityConductingOrganizations.title: Activity Conducting Organization(s)
ActivityConductingOrganizations.description: A name of the Organization conducting an activity.

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: A name of the Organization conducting an activity.

ActivityLatitude.title: Activity Latitude
ActivityLatitude.description: Latitude of actual monitoring site if different from formal station description

ActivityLongitude.title: Activity Longitude
ActivityLongitude.description: Longitude of actual monitoring site if different from formal station description

ActivitySourceMapScale.title: Activity Source Map Scale
ActivitySourceMapScale.description: Integer representing distance on ground for one unit of measure on map or photo, required when Horizontal Collection Method Name is `Interpolation-Map`

ActivityHorizontalAccuracyMeasure.title: Activity Horizontal Accuracy Measure
ActivityHorizontalAccuracyMeasure.description: The horizontal measure indicating the relative accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates

ActivityHorizontalAccuracyUnit.title: Activity Horizontal Accuracy Unit
ActivityHorizontalAccuracyUnit.description: Unit of measure of the relative accuracy, required if Activity Horizontal Accuracy Measure is reported.

ActivityHorizontalCollectionMethod.title: Activity Horizontal Collection Method
ActivityHorizontalCollectionMethod.description: Method used to determine Lat/Long coordinates, required when Activity Location is provided.

ActivityHorizontalCoordinateReferenceSys.title: Activity Horizontal Coordinate Reference System
ActivityHorizontalCoordinateReferenceSys.description: Datum used to determine Lat/Long, required when Activity Location is provided.

AssemblageSampledName.title: Assemblage Sampled Name
AssemblageSampledName.description: Must be reported if Activity Media Name is `Biological`

CollectionDurationMeasure.title: Collection Duration Measure
CollectionDurationMeasure.description: Value of the length of time a collection procedure was performed (e.g. total time kick net was used).

CollectionDurationUnit.title: Collection Duration Unit
CollectionDurationUnit.description: Unit for the value of the length of time a collection procedure was performed (e.g. total time kick net was used).  Required if Collection Duration Measure  is reported.

SamplingComponentName.title: Sampling Component Name
SamplingComponentName.description: Single entity within a sampling frame at which a collection procedure or protocol was performed.  E.g. transect, grid, plot

SamplingComponentPlaceInSeries.title: Sampling Component Place In Series
SamplingComponentPlaceInSeries.description: The order in which a component within the sampling frame was visited in relation to the other components.  E.g. Transect A would be reported as `1`

ReachLengthMeasure.title: Reach Length Measure
ReachLengthMeasure.description: The measure of the water body length distance in which the procedure or protocol was performed

ReachWidthMeasure.title: Reach Width Measure
ReachWidthMeasure.description: The measure of the water body width distance in which the procedure or protocol was performed

ReachWidthUnit.title: Reach Width Unit
ReachWidthUnit.description: The measure unit of the water body width distance in which the procedure or protocol was performed.  Required if Reach Width Measure Value is reported.

PassCount.title: Pass Count
PassCount.description: The number of passes through the water from which the sample was collected.

NetType.title: Net Type
NetType.description: The text describing the type of net.

NetSurfaceAreaMeasure.title: Net Surface Area Measure
NetSurfaceAreaMeasure.description: Measurement of the effective surface area of the net used during biological monitoring sample collection.  Required if Net Type information is provided.

NetSurfaceAreaUnit.title: Net Surface Area Unit
NetSurfaceAreaUnit.description: The code that represents the unit for measuring the item.  Required if Net Surface Area Measure is provided.

NetMeshSizeMeasure.title: Net Mesh Size Measure
NetMeshSizeMeasure.description: Measurement of the mesh size of the net used during biological monitoring sample collection.   Required if Net Type information is provided.

NetMeshSizeUnit.title: Net Mesh Size Unit
NetMeshSizeUnit.description: The code that represents the unit for measuring the item.  Required if Net Mesh Size Measure is provided.

BoatSpeedMeasure.title: Boat Speed Measure
BoatSpeedMeasure.description: A measurement of the boat speed during biological monitoring sample collection.

BoatSpeedUnit.title: Boat Speed Unit
BoatSpeedUnit.description: The code that represents the unit for measuring the item.  Required if Boat Speed Measure is Reported.

CurrentSpeedMeasure.title: Current Speed Measure
CurrentSpeedMeasure.description: Measurement of the current during biological monitoring sample collection.

CurrentSpeedUnit.title: Current Speed Unit
CurrentSpeedUnit.description: The code that represents the unit for measuring the item.  Required if Current Speed Measure is Reported.

ToxicityTestType.title: Toxicity Test Type
ToxicityTestType.description: Identifies the type of toxicity as either Acute or Chronic.

SampleCollectionMethodID.title: Sample Collection Method ID
SampleCollectionMethodID.description: User defined ID code assigned by organization, required if Activity Type Code contains the word `Sample`, also require context (assigning organization) and name of method, see Analytical & Collection Methods Tab

SampleCollectionEquipmentName.title: Sample Collection Equipment Name
SampleCollectionEquipmentName.description: Gear used to collect sample, required if Sample Collection Method is present

SampleCollectionEquipmentComment.title: Sample Collection Equipment Comment
SampleCollectionEquipmentComment.description: General comments further describing the Sample Collection Equipment used

SamplePreparationMethodID.title: Sample Preparation Method ID
SamplePreparationMethodID.description: The identification number or code assigned by the method publisher.

SampleContainerType.title: Sample Container Type
SampleContainerType.description: The text describing the sample container type.  Required if Sample Preparation Method ID is reported.

SampleContainerColor.title: Sample Container Color
SampleContainerColor.description: The text describing the sample container color.  Required if Sample Preparation Method ID is reported.

ChemicalPreservativeUsed.title: Chemical Preservative Used
ChemicalPreservativeUsed.description: Information describing the chemical means to preserve the sample.  Either Chemical Preservative Used or Thermal Preservative Used must be provided if the Sample Preparation Method ID is reported.

ThermalPreservativeUsed.title: Thermal Preservative Used
ThermalPreservativeUsed.description: Information describing the thermal preservation of the sample.  Either Chemical Preservative Used or Thermal Preservative Used must be provided if the Sample Preparation Method ID is reported.

SampleTransportStorageDescription.title: Sample Transport Storage Description
SampleTransportStorageDescription.description: The text describing sample handling and transport procedures used.  Required if Sample Preparation Method ID is reported.

MetricTypeID.title: Metric Type ID
MetricTypeID.description: A designator used to describe the unique name, number, or code assigned to identify the metric (Organization specific).

MetricTypeContext.title: Metric Type Context
MetricTypeContext.description: Identifies the source or data system that created or defined the metric.

ActivityMetricValue.title: Activity Metric Value
ActivityMetricValue.description: The recorded dimension, capacity, quality, or amount of something ascertained by measuring or observing.

ActivityMetricValueUnit.title: Activity Metric Value Unit
ActivityMetricValueUnit.description: The code that represents the unit for measuring the item.  Required if Activity Metric Value is reported.

ActivityMetricScore.title: Activity Metric Score
ActivityMetricScore.description: Provides the scaled or calculated score for the activity metric.

ActivityMetricComment.title: Activity Metric Comment
ActivityMetricComment.description: Free text with general comments concerning the metric.

IndexID.title: Index ID
IndexID.description: A unique designator used to identify a unique index record that the activity metric is associated with.

IndexTypeID.title: Index Type ID
IndexTypeID.description: Type of Activity (example: Field Msr/Obs, Sample-Routine, etc.)

IndexScore.title: Index Score
IndexScore.description: Medium in which sample or measurement was taken (example: Water, Sediment, etc.)

IndexQualifierCode.title: Index Qualifier Code
IndexQualifierCode.description: Name or code indicating the environmental matrix as a subdivision of the sample media.

ActivityAttachmentFileName.title: Activity Attachment File Name
ActivityAttachmentFileName.description: The text describing the descriptive name used to represent the Activity Attachment file including file extension.

ActivityAttachmentType.title: Activity Attachment Type
ActivityAttachmentType.description: The text or acronym describing the binary content type of a file.  Required if Activity Attachment File Name is reported.

DataLoggerLine.title: Data Logger Line
DataLoggerLine.description: Unique ID for the specific result recorded by a continuous data logger.  Often the ID includes the date and time to indicate the specific time data was captured. Required if Activity Type  contains the phrase `Data Logger`; Must be unique within Activity.

ResultDetectionCondition.title: Result Detection Condition
ResultDetectionCondition.description: Result detection Condition is required if Result Measure Value is blank; Must not be populated if Result Measure Value is provided.

CharacteristicName.title: Characteristic Name
CharacteristicName.description: Valid characteristic name; required if activity yields results or detection conditions that are being reported

MethodSpeciation.title: Method Speciation
MethodSpeciation.description: Identifies the chemical speciation in which the measured result is expressed

ResultSampleFraction.title: Result Sample Fraction
ResultSampleFraction.description: Text name of fraction of sample associated with result, required for certain characteristics, see Characteristics

ResultValue.title: Result Value
ResultValue.description: Measured value of characteristic, required if Result Detection Condition Text is blank, No entry allowed if Result Detection Condition Text is populated.

ResultUnit.title: Result Unit
ResultUnit.description: Units for characteristic result, required if a non text result is reported

ResultQualifier.title: Result Qualifier
ResultQualifier.description: A code used to identify any qualifying issues that affect the results.

ResultStatusID.title: Result Status ID
ResultStatusID.description: Required if result is reported; Indicates acceptability of result with respect to QA/QC, Data will not go into the STORET wharehouse if the status is  `Preliminary`

StatisticalBaseCode.title: Statistical Base Code
StatisticalBaseCode.description: Code used for method used to calculate derived results, such as Mean, Maximum, etc.

ResultValueType.title: Result Value Type
ResultValueType.description: Qualifies process used in the determination of result value (eg. Actual, Estimated, Calculated).  Required if result is non-text.  Default is Actual.

ResultWeightBasis.title: Result Weight Basis
ResultWeightBasis.description: Form of sample or portion of sample associated with result value (eg. wet weight, dry weight, etc.)

ResultTimeBasis.title: Result Time Basis
ResultTimeBasis.description: The period of time (in days) over which a measurement was made. For example, BOD can be measured as 5 day or 20 day BOD.

ResultTemperatureBasis.title: Result Temperature Basis
ResultTemperatureBasis.description: The name that represents the controlled temperature at which the sample was maintained during analysis, e.g. 25 deg BOD analysis.

ResultParticleSizeBasis.title: Result Particle Size Basis
ResultParticleSizeBasis.description: User defined free text describing the particle size class for which the associated result is defined.

Precision.title: Precision
Precision.description: A measure of mutual agreement among individual measurements of the same property usually under prescribed similar conditions.

Bias.title: Bias
Bias.description: The systematic or persistent distortion of a measurement process which causes error in one direction.

ConfidenceInterval.title: Confidence Interval
ConfidenceInterval.description: A range of values constructed so that this range has a specified probability of including the true population mean.

UpperConfidenceLimit.title: Upper Confidence Limit
UpperConfidenceLimit.description: Value of the upper end of the confidence interval.

LowerConfidenceLimit.title: Lower Confidence Limit
LowerConfidenceLimit.description: Value of the lower end of the confidence interval.

ResultComment.title: Result Comment
ResultComment.description: Provided to allow for the entry of comments about result

ResultDepthHeightMeasure.title: Result Depth/Height Measure
ResultDepthHeightMeasure.description: A measurement of the vertical location (measured from a reference point) at which a result is obtained.

ResultDepthHeightUnit.title: Result Depth/Height Unit
ResultDepthHeightUnit.description: Units for Result Depth Height Measure, required if Result Depth Height Measure entered

ResultDepthAltitudeReferencePoint.title: Result Depth/Altitude Reference Point
ResultDepthAltitudeReferencePoint.description: The reference used to indicate the datum or reference used to establish the depth/altitude of a result.

ResultSamplingPointName.title: Result Sampling Point Name
ResultSamplingPointName.description: Single point name within a sampling frame or protocol that is associated with the reported result.

BiologicalIntent.title: Biological Intent
BiologicalIntent.description: `Population Census` is meant to allow for simple species counts, for example, counts of benthic macroinvertebrates sampled within a stream.  `Group Summary` is meant to allow for reporting of attributes for a group of organisms, for example, the sex of a group of fish.  `Frequency Class` is inteded for reporting counts within different bins or categories within a group.  `Individual` is used for reporting measurements of individuals caught.  `Tissue` is used to report analysis results of tissue samples.  `Toxicity` is used to report the results of toxicity testing on a species.  Required if entering biological or tissue data.

BiologicalIndividualID.title: Biological Individual ID
BiologicalIndividualID.description: A number uniquely identifyinig an individual in accordance with the total number of individuals reported.

SubjectTaxonomicName.title: Subject Taxonomic Name
SubjectTaxonomicName.description: Required if biological results are being reported

UnidentifiedSpeciesID.title: Unidentified Species ID
UnidentifiedSpeciesID.description: If species is not a part of the Subject Taxonomic Name list, but higher level such as Genus is listed, this data element can be used to indicate a unique species name

SampleTissueAnatomy.title: Sample Tissue Anatomy
SampleTissueAnatomy.description: Name of anatomy from which tissue sample was taken.  Required if Bioligical Intent Name is Tissue.

GroupSummaryCountWeightMeasure.title: Group Summary Count Weight Measure
GroupSummaryCountWeightMeasure.description: Required if Biological Intent is `Group Summary`.  Captures the total count or total sample weight for a group of species being reported on.

GroupSummaryCountWeightUnit.title: Group Summary Count Weight Unit
GroupSummaryCountWeightUnit.description: Required if Group Summary Count Weight Measure is reported.  Captures the total count unit or total sample weight unit for a group of species being reported on.

TaxonCellForm.title: Taxon Cell Form
TaxonCellForm.description: The name of the cell form for phytoplankton organisms expressed as a result.

TaxonCellShape.title: Taxon Cell Shape
TaxonCellShape.description: The cell shape of the phytoplankton organism.

TaxonHabit.title: Taxon Habit
TaxonHabit.description: The position that the characteristic occupies in a food chain

TaxonVoltinism.title: Taxon Voltinism
TaxonVoltinism.description: The number of broods or generations of the characteristic in a year

TaxonPollutionTolerance.title: Taxon Pollution Tolerance
TaxonPollutionTolerance.description: A code or factor representing the ability of the reported taxon to tolerate pollution

TaxonPollutionToleranceScale.title: Taxon Pollution Tolerance Scale
TaxonPollutionToleranceScale.description: Provides a description of the scale used for the taxonomic pollution tolerance value.

TaxonTrophicLevel.title: Taxon Trophic Level
TaxonTrophicLevel.description: A code or value representing the trophic level with which the reported taxon is typically assigned

TaxonFunctionalFeedingGroup.title: Taxon Functional Feeding Group
TaxonFunctionalFeedingGroup.description: For entries representing taxa, a code representing the functional feeding group with which the reported taxon is typically associated.

TaxonCitationID.title: Taxon Citation ID
TaxonCitationID.description: Identifies the source that defines the taxonomic details

FrequencyClassDescriptor.title: Frequency Class Descriptor
FrequencyClassDescriptor.description: Required if Frequency Class Information is Reported

FrequencyClassDescriptorUnit.title: Frequency Class Descriptor Unit
FrequencyClassDescriptorUnit.description: Required if the Frequency Class Descriptor Code is a Measured Value (eg. Length, etc.)

LowerClassBound.title: Lower Class Bound
LowerClassBound.description: Required if the Frequency Class Descriptor Code is a Measured Value (eg. Length, etc.)

UpperClassBound.title: Upper Class Bound
UpperClassBound.description: Required if the Frequency Class Descriptor Code is a Measured Value (eg. Length, etc.)

ResultAttachmentFileName.title: Result Attachment File Name
ResultAttachmentFileName.description: References and electronic attachments to a Result description including any other documents, images, maps, photos, laboratory materials, geospatial coverages, and other objects associated with the Result

ResultAttachmentType.title: Result Attachment Type
ResultAttachmentType.description: The text or acronym describing the binary content type of a file.  Required if Result Attachment File Name is provided.

ResultAnalyticalMethodID.title: Result Analytical Method ID
ResultAnalyticalMethodID.description: ID number assigned by method publisher, required if Activity Type Code contains the word Sample, for nationally defined methods see Nat. Methods Tab, to define an analytical method unique to your organization see Analytical & Collection Methods Tab

ResultAnalyticalMethodContext.title: Result Analytical Method Context
ResultAnalyticalMethodContext.description: Source of method, required if Activity Type Code is Sample, for nationally defined methods see Nat. Methods Tab, to define an analytical method unique to your organization see Analytical & Collection Methods Tab

LaboratoryName.title: Laboratory Name
LaboratoryName.description: Name of Laboratory performing the analysis

AnalysisStartTime.title: Analysis Start Time
AnalysisStartTime.description: The time of day that is reported.

AnalysisStartTimeZone.title: Analysis Start Time Zone
AnalysisStartTimeZone.description: The time zone for which the time of day is reported.  Required if Analysis Start Time is reported.

AnalysisEndTime.title: Analysis End Time
AnalysisEndTime.description: The time of day that is reported.

AnalysisEndTimeZone.title: Analysis End Time Zone
AnalysisEndTimeZone.description: The time zone for which the time of day is reported.  Required if Analysis End Time is reported.

ResultLaboratoryCommentCode.title: Result Laboratory Comment Code
ResultLaboratoryCommentCode.description: Remarks which further describe the laboratory procedures which produced the result.

ResultDetectionQuantitationLimitType.title: Result Detection/Quantitation Limit Type
ResultDetectionQuantitationLimitType.description: Text describing the type of detection or quantitation limit used in the analysis of a characteristic.  Required if Result Detection Condition is `Not Detected`, `Present Above Quantification Limit`, or `Present Below Quantification Limit`.

ResultDetectionQuantitationLimitMeasure.title: Result Detection/Quantitation Limit Measure
ResultDetectionQuantitationLimitMeasure.description: The reportable measure of the result for the chemical, microbiological or other characteristic being analyzed.  Required if Result Detection Condition is `Not Detected`, `Present Above Quantification Limit`, or `Present Below Quantification Limit`.

ResultDetectionQuantitationLimitUnit.title: Result Detection/Quantitation Limit Unit
ResultDetectionQuantitationLimitUnit.description: The code that represents the unit for measuring the chemical substance, microbiological substance or other characteristic.  Required if Result Detection Condition is `Not Detected`, `Present Above Quantification Limit`, or `Present Below Quantification Limit`.  Also Required if Result Detection/Quantitation Limit Measure is reported.

LaboratoryAccreditationIndicator.title: Laboratory Accreditation Indicator
LaboratoryAccreditationIndicator.description: Indicates whether the laboratory is accredited.

LabSamplePreparationMethodID.title: Lab Sample Preparation Method ID
LabSamplePreparationMethodID.description: Identifying code assigned by the method publisher about the method followed to prepare a sample for analysis

LabSamplePreparationStartTime.title: Lab Sample Preparation Start Time
LabSamplePreparationStartTime.description: The time of day that is reported.

LabSamplePreparationStartTimeZone.title: Lab Sample Preparation Start Time Zone
LabSamplePreparationStartTimeZone.description: The time zone for which the time of day is reported.   Required if Lab Sample Preparation Start Time is reported.

LabSamplePreparationEndTime.title: Lab Sample Preparation End Time
LabSamplePreparationEndTime.description: The time of day that is reported.

LabSamplePreparationEndTimeZone.title: Lab Sample Preparation End Time Zone
LabSamplePreparationEndTimeZone.description: The time zone for which the time of day is reported. Required if Lab Sample Preparation End Time is reported.

SubstanceDilutionFactor.title: Substance Dilution Factor
SubstanceDilutionFactor.description: The overall dilution of the substance subjected to this analysis.

ActivityGroupID.title: Activity Group ID
ActivityGroupID.description: Designator that uniquely identifies a grouping of activities within an organization.  Required for reporting an Activity Group.

ActivityGroupName.title: Activity Group Name
ActivityGroupName.description: A name of an activity group.

ActivityGroupType.title: Activity Group Type
ActivityGroupType.description: Identifies the type of grouping of a set of activities.  Required if Reporting an Activity Group.
